subject: Thanks for your refinance application, we are ready to lend you money regardless of Credit
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
 
If your family OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pin money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this lot will expire TODAY):
 
$213,000+ loan
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
 
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this user-friendly form... 
 
Do not worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
 
http://warltqrend.com/
